description:
Gao and his friends start an intensive week-long training session at Master Bunbuku`s training camp. En route to the camp, mysterious monsters kidnap Master Bunbuku and the others. Gao must overcome his inability to use the X Tempest Buster.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gasshuku Start! Fukkatsu no x Ten Buster!!
Training Camp Begins! The X Tempest Buster Revives!
合宿スタート! 復活の×天バスター!!
